channel.title: Throne of Lies on Patreon
channel.description:
**[Donate via Patreon]** Buy us a beer, or even help us afford covering a few costs by donating via Patreon! You will be rewarded with special Discord roles to stand out and even a mousepad for the higher-donors. Shipping is FREE.
>> **Donate now @** https://www.patreon.com/Imperium42
Here is the new Tol patreon that I don't think was announced. Any way, if you want to help the game improve and possibly reach the goals it didn't reach in the kick-starter then you know what to do :smile:
[color=red]-- Post approved/commandeered by Xblade[/color]
